verses.text: Rebuke \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* anger, punish \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w be|strong="H3068"\w* gracious \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* weakness. Heal \w me|strong="H3256"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* racked \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* body;

\w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w* utterly racked. \w Why|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* wait \w so|strong="H3588"\w* long, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

Turn, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w rescue|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* love.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* none can \w call|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol \w who|strong="H3068"\w* can praise \w you|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w so|strong="H3588"\w* weary \w of|strong="H4194"\w* sighing. All \w the|strong="H3588"\w* night \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bed swim, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* wet \w my|strong="H3588"\w* couch \w with|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* tears.
\w My|strong="H3605"\w* eyes swollen \w with|strong="H3605"\w* grief; \w from|strong="H3915"\w* weeping caused \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* foes.
Begone, workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* wrong, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* heard \w my|strong="H3605"\w* loud weeping,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* entreaty, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* accepts \w my|strong="H8085"\w* prayer.

\w My|strong="H8085"\w* foes \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* stricken \w with|strong="H3068"\w* terror, \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dismay \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moment.
